name: Alex Kharlukhi
bio: A passionate local guide with over 10 years of experience exploring Cherrapunji's hidden waterfalls and living root bridges.

reviews.comment: Alex was amazing! So knowledgeable and friendly.
He made our trip to the waterfalls unforgettable.

name: Sarah Warjri
bio: Specializes in caving and adventure tours. Knows all the best spots for photography.

reviews.comment: Very energetic and an excellent guide.

name: James Rymbai
bio: Your personal guide to Shillong's rich culture and history. Fluent in English and Khasi.

name: Elina Laitflang
bio: An expert on the flora and fauna of Mawlynnong, India's cleanest village.

name: David Syiem
bio: An experienced guide specializing in trekking and hiking tours around the Cherrapunjee area. He has extensive knowledge of the local trails and is an avid bird watcher.

reviews.comment: David's knowledge of the trails was incredible. We saw so many amazing birds!
A very patient and helpful guide.

name: Pynbiang Nongrum
bio: Known for her expertise in local folklore and sustainable tourism. She offers a unique perspective on the region's cultural heritage and is passionate about preserving its natural beauty.

reviews.comment: A wonderful storyteller! Learned so much about the local culture.

name: Linda Sangma
bio: Adventure enthusiast specializing in rock climbing and waterfall rappelling experiences in Cherrapunji.

reviews.comment: Linda made our adventure thrilling and safe.

name: Rohit Lyngdoh
bio: Expert in eco-tourism with deep knowledge about Cherrapunjiâ€™s biodiversity and conservation practices.

reviews.comment: Learned so much about local wildlife and plants.

name: Meban Kharsyntiew
bio: A cultural guide who specializes in Khasi traditions, festivals, and village life tours.
